pr_title: SAK-43377 - Centralize some kernel comparators for sorting consistency.

timeline.author: jesusmmp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@

+
+package org.sakaiproject.util.comparator;
+
+import java.util.Comparator;
+
+import org.sakaiproject.alias.api.Alias;
+
+public class AliasCreatedTimeComparator implements Comparator<Alias> {
+    public int compare(Alias lhs, Alias rhs) {
+    // Sort by date, then by ID to assure consistent order.
+    return lhs.getCreatedTime().compareTo(rhs.getCreatedTime()) * 10 + lhs.getId().compareTo(rhs.getId());

timeline.message: SAK-43377 - Centralize some kernel comparators for sorting consistency.
